comment: Believe it or not, Elizabeth Warren is claiming this test vindicates her. At best, it would make her /64 native American. Most tribes require at least /8 to be considered a member. If I take a DNA test and I find % African blood, can I get some affirmative action from you whiteys?
amr:

(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (o / or
            :op1 (b / believe-01
                  :ARG0 (y / you)
                  :ARG1 (c / claim-01
                        :ARG0 (p / person
                              :name (n / name
                                    :op1 "Elizabeth"
                                    :op2 "Warren"))
                        :ARG1 (v / vindicate-01
                              :ARG0 (t / test-01
                                    :mod (t2 / this))
                              :ARG1 p)))
            :op2 (b2 / believe-01
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG0 y
                  :ARG1 c))
      :snt2 (m2 / make-02
            :ARG0 (ii / it)
            :ARG1 (e / equal-01
                  :ARG1 (p2 / person
                        :mod (n2 / native)
                        :mod (c2 / country
                              :name (n3 / name
                                    :op1 "America")))
                  :ARG2 (p3 / person
                        :mod (s / slash
                              :op1 64
                              :op2 8)))
            :mod (a / at-best))
      :snt3 (r / require-01
            :ARG0 (t3 / tribe
                  :quant (m3 / most))
            :ARG1 (a2 / at-least
                  :op1 (p4 / percentage-entity
                        :value 8))
            :ARG2 (c3 / consider-02
                  :ARG1 (p5 / person
                        :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                              :ARG1 t3
                              :ARG2 (m4 / member))))
            :snt4 (p6 / possible-01
                  :ARG1 (g / get-01
                        :ARG0 (ii2 / i)
                        :ARG1 (a3 / affirmative-action
                              :quant (s2 / some))
                        :ARG2 (y2 / you
                              :ARG1-of (w / white-02))
                        :polarity (a4 / amr-unknown))
                  :condition (a5 / and
                        :op1 t
                        :ARG0 ii2
                        :ARG1 (n4 / nucleic-acid
                              :name (n5 / name
                                    :op1 "DNA")))
                  :op2 (f / find-01
                        :ARG0 ii2
                        :ARG1 (b3 / blood
                              :mod (c4 / continent
                                    :name (n6 / name
                                          :op1 "Africa"))
                              :quant p4)))))
